text:
support was able to restore the settings, but they still don't know what is causing it.

it has since popped up in another portal, which was last edited around the same Aug/Sep timeframe and has since reverted.

This is our ticket #11763507 if anyone else needs to refer to it for getting the settings restored.

Also, if anyone can capture this happening on a screenrecording, where edits are made, published, and reverted (although seems impossible given the time delay), it would help them isolate the issue.
